title: NFT Web Applicaiton Project
description: This unique project simulates a vulnerable NFT marketplace web app with deliberately introduced security weaknesses to gain practical understanding by identifying and fixing them.

title: Bookstore
description: The goal of this project is to create a website that showcases a collection of books recommended by users.

title: egoChat
description: A web app (egoChat) that lets you chat with friends in real time.

title: Todo React Express
description: A revamp of a frontend todo app I created a while ago into a fully functional web app by implementing a login system and database integration.

title: egoChat iOS
description: An iOS app for egoChat that allows for fast and direct messaging with friends.

title: Todo List
description: A todo list that lets you add new todos.

title: 5678dancestudio.net
description: A front-end development project from a class, it is a rebuild of 5678dancestudio.net website from scratch for education purposes. No copyright infringement intended.

title: Java BMI Calculator
description: A GUI app written in Java for calculating BMI.
